Row.Text: This Province is: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_ProvinceIcon} {2_ProvinceDesc}[ENDCOLOR] Level.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Effects:[ENDCOLOR]{3_Bonuses}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Right-Click for details.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]Build a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{4_BuildingDesc}[ENDCOLOR] to upgrade these bonuses. To unlock one, the city must have:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CONNECTED] Connection to the Capital [COLOR_CYAN]AND[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{5_Num} [ICON_CITIZEN] Population (Current: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{6_Num}[ENDCOLOR]) [COLOR_CYAN]OR[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{7_Num} [ICON_WORKER] Improved Tiles (Current: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{8_Num}[ENDCOLOR])[NEWLINE]------------------

[COLOR_FADING_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levies will not be raised if the city is considered [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_REBELLIOUS][ICON_JFD_YELLOW_FIST] Rebellious[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_FADING_NEGATIVE_TEXT] or [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_LOYALTY_JFD_SEPARATIST][ICON_JFD_RED_FIST] Separatist[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_FADING_NEGATIVE_TEXT].[ENDCOLOR]

You have [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR]/{2_Num} [ICON_WORKER] Improvements needed to upgrade this city's Province level.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases with the number of existing Provinces of this upgrade Level.

You have [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR]/{2_Num} [ICON_CITIZEN] Population needed to upgrade this city's Province level.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases with the number of existing Provinces of this upgrade Level.
You have a [ICON_CONNECTED] Connection to the Capital.
The Summer Palace acts as a [ICON_CONNECTED] Connection to the Capital.
You need a [ICON_CONNECTED] Connection to the Capital.
{1_FontIcon} This Province can now be upgraded by constructing a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Desc}[ENDCOLOR].
Receive {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levy Unit ([COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_UnitDesc}[ENDCOLOR]) when a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]MAJOR[ENDCOLOR] war is declared against you.
Levies begin with [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}%[ENDCOLOR] of the XP from Buildings in this city.
[ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold costs of acquiring new tiles is reduced by {1_Num}%.
[ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levies having been raised in your time of war now disband in this time of peace.
[ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levies have been raised in your provinces in defense of the nation![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Call to arms:{1_CityList}
[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT][ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levies have Max 50 Hit Points. However, they may move immediately after purchase.[ENDCOLOR]
[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]City must not have a Military Garrison.[ENDCOLOR]
